name: PolyShootR
description:
PolyShootR is a small shoot them up game inspired by old school space shooters with a neon aesthetic. Shoot enemies, gather resources, upgrade your ship and survive as long as you can ! One hit and it's game over !

Controls : 

Mouse : Aim

W / A / S /D : Move around

Left click : Fire

Shift : Dash

Space : Shield

Escape : Pause

E : Upgrade Menu

Thanks to Jason Shaw for music and SFXR for sounds !

Feedback appreciated, thanks for playing !
